titles.title: Gädlä ḥawaryat, Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Gädlä ḥawaryat, Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles (fols. 1ra-150vb) I-1) Introduction (fols. 1ra-1va) I-2) The Preaching of St. Peter (fols. 1va-12rb) I-3) The Martyrdom of St. Peter (fols. 12rb-14vb) I-4) The Martyrdom of St. Paul (fols. 14vb-16vb) I-5) The Preaching of St. Simon the son of Cleopas, surnamed Judas or Nathaniel (fols. 17ra-18vb) I-6) The Martyrdom of St. Simon the son of Cleopas, surnamed Judas or Nathaniel (fols. 18vb-19vb) I-7) The Preaching of St. James the Just (fols. 19vb-21rb) I-8) The Martyrdom of St. James the Just (fols. 21va-35vb) I-9) The Preaching of St. Bartholomew (fols. 36ra-42rb) I-10) The Martyrdom of St. Bartholomew (fols. 42rb-44vb) I-11) The Acts of St. Matthew (fols. 44vb-51vb) I-12) The Martyrdom of St. Matthew (fols: 51vb-53rb) I-13) The Martyrdom of St. Luke (fols. 53rb-56vb) I-14) The Preaching of St. Philip (fols. 56vb-61ra) I-15) The Martyrdom of St. Philip (fols. 61ra-63va) I-16) The Preaching of St. Andrew (fols. 63vb-72vb) I-17) The Acts of St. Andrew and St. Bartholomew (fols. 72vb-89ra) I-18) The Martyrdom of St. Andrew (fols. 89rb-92ra) I-19) The Acts of St. John the son of Zebedee (fols. 92ra-105ra) I-20) The Death of St. John the son of Zebedee (fols. 105ra-109va) I-21) The Martyrdom of St. James the son of Alphaeus (fols. 109vb-110va) I-22) The Preaching of St. Matthias (fols. 110vb-124ra) I-23) The Martyrdom of St. Matthias (fols. 124ra-126rb) I-24) The Acts of St. James the son of Zebedee (fols. 126rb-130ra) I-25) The Martyrdom of St. James the son of Zebedee (fols. 130ra-131vb) I-26) The Martyrdom of St. Mark the Evangelist (fols. 132ra-135vb) I-27) The Preaching of St. Thomas (fols. 135vb-150ra) I-28) The Martyrdom of St. Thomas (fols. 150ra-150vb), incomplete.

copyists.copyist: The same scribe probably wrote Mss. MY-002 and MY-008.

donors.donor: The name Hallo ʾAmlak is mentioned in the supplication formulas (e.g., fols. 1va, l.15; 16va, l.29; 63va, l.29; 131vb, l.23), but elsewhere the name Hallo Krǝstos (fols. 35vb, l.31; 44vb, ls. 20-21).

txstates.txstate: The binding is damaged. The fols. 1-4 are loose, fols. 4-16 and 17-27 are held together by cord(s) led through all leaves. Some leaves are separated from their counterparts. Some last fols. are missing.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards. Two pairs of sewing stations.

squires.squire:
I(...) – II(...) – III(...) – IV(6/fols. 47r-52v) – V(8/fols. 53r-60v) – VI(8/fols. 61r-68v) – VII(8/fols. 69r-76v) – VIII(8/fols. 77r-84v) – IX(8/fols. 85r-92v) – X(...) – XI፲፩(4/fols. 102r-105v) – ፲፪XII(5/fols. 106r-110v) – ፲፫XIII፲፪(5/fols. 11r-115v) – XIV(5/fols. 116r-120v) - XV(4/fols. 121r-124v) – XVI(4/ fols. 125r-128v) – XVII(4/fols. 129r-132v) – XVIII(6/fols. 133r-138v) – XIX(4/fols. 139r-142v) – XX(4/fols. 143r-146v) – XXI(4/fols. 147r-150v).
It is difficult to understand the exact structure and the number of the quires due to the condition of the Ms.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible (s. fol. 43r). Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written below the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donors; a few lines in the incipit of each text, alternating with black lines; sometimes the first line of the account proper; Ethiopic numerals or their elements; elements of the punctuation signs and of the crux ansata.

desccontent.text: I. Gädlä Ḥawaryat, Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles
desccontent.mss: EMML no. 1482 (15th cent.), fols. 2r-152v: “Combat of the Apostles [Gadla Ḥawāreyāt]” (EMML IV, 606-08; Monastery of Abba Säyfä Mikaʾel, Ṣaʿada Ǝmba Śǝllase, Kärän, Eritrea). EMML no. 1767 (1292/7), fols. 4r-232r: “Combat of the Apostles [Gadla Ḥawāreyāt]” (EMML V, 237-39; Monastery of Ḥayq Ǝsṭifanos, Ambassäl, Wällo). EMML no. 1825 (14/15th cent.), fols. 1r-152v: “Combat of the Apostles [Gadla Ḥawāreyāt]” (EMML V, 271-72; Monastery of Ḥayq Ǝsṭifanos, Ambassäl, Wällo). Éthiopien 58 (15th cent.), fols. 1r-162v: “ገድለ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ Gadla Ḥawaryat <Vies des Apôtres>” (AbbCat 69-70. See also CRAbb 69-71, nos. 45,46). Éthiopien 64 (16th cent.), fols. 1r-171v: “ገድለ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ Gadla Ḥawaryat <Vies des Apôtres>” (AbbCat 74-75). Orient. 678 (15th cent.), fols. 1r-171v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 59-62, no. 101). Ṭanasee 173 = Daga Ǝsṭifanos 62 (15th cent.), fols. 1ra-178rb “ገድለ፡ ሐዋርያት። [= Viten der Apostel]” (SixTana III, 226). Éthiopien 52 (14th cent.), fols. 16r-204v: “Actes et martyres des apôtres et évangélistes” (ZotBNat 53-57, no. 33 bis). ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ EMML no. 676 (20th cent.), fols. 1r-255r: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (EMML II, 431-32; Patriarchate Library, quarter of Mäkkakäläña, Addis Abäba). EMML no. 813 (1944/5), fols. 1r-236r: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (EMML III, 128-29; Church of the Apostles, quarter of Täklä Haymanot, Addis Abäba). EMML no. 2406 (1775/1809), fols. 3r-124r: “Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles [Gadla Ḥawāreyāt]” (EMML VI, 469; Church of Afär Bayne Täklä Haymanot, Ankobärr, Shoa). EMML no. 4442 (18th cent.), fols. 3r-161r: “Combat of the Apostles [Gadla Ḥawāreyāt]” (EMML X, 156-57; Church of Sälla Dǝngay, Moǧa and Wädärra, Shoa). Orient. 683 (17th cent.), fols. 1r-254v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 62-65, no. 102). Orient. 681 (1705/6), fols. 1r-196v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 65-66, no. 103). Orient. 680 (1711/12), fols. 1r-193v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 66-67, no. 104). Orient. 682 (18th cent.), fols. 1r-195v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 67, no. 105). Orient. 677 (1764/5), fols. 1r-199v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 67-69, no. 106). Orient. 679 (1785/86), fols. 1r-183v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 69-70, no. 107). Orient. 684 (18th cent.), fols. 1r-94v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 70, no. 108). Orient. 685 (18th cent.), fols. 1r-149v: “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 70-71, no. 109). Orient. 829 (18th cent.), fol. 12r (mutilated): “The Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles” (WrBriMus 71, no. 110). StrRyMan 6 (early 19th cent. ?), fols. 1ra-242r: “Gädlä Ḥawaryat, Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles and the Evangelists” (StrRyMan 9-12). Vat. Aeth. 234 (20th cent.), fols. 5r-160v: “Acta apostolorum apocrypha” (GréTisVat I, 739-741). Vat. Aeth. 296 (1763), fols. 2r-208v: “Actes apocryphes des apôtres” (LanVat 494-95).

literature.text: A. Bausi; “Ḥawaryat: Gädlä ḥawaryat”, in: EAE II, 1049-51. ID., “I manoscritti etiopici di J.M. Wansleben nella Biblioteca Nazionale Centrale di Firenze”, RSE 33, 1989 [1991], 5-33. BauGaH. CANT, s. index. I. Guidi, “Gli Atti apocrifi degli Apostoli nei testi copti, arabi ed etiopici”, Giornale della società Asiatica Italiana 2, 1888, 1-66. F. Morard, “Acts of the Apostles”, in: CE I, 58-61.

desccontent.incipit: Fol. 1ra (Introduction): በስመ: አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ሥርዐቶሙ፡ ለሐዋርያት፡ ባዕዳንሂ፡ እምሰብዓ፡ ወክልኤቱ፡ አርድእት፡ ንኡሳን፡ ወዘኮነ፡ ኵሉ፡ እምዜናሆሙ፡ ውስተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ብሔር፡ ወተዝካረ፡ ስምዑ[sic]፡ እለ፡ ኮኑ፡ እምኔሆሙ፡ ወእለ፡ አዕረፉ፡ እምኔሆሙ፡ ጸሎቶሙ፡ ወበረከቶሙ፡ ትዕቀበነ፡ እስከ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨… [fol. 1va, l.17] ንቅድም፡ በአኰቴተ፡ እግዚኣብሔር፡ በረድኤቱ፡ ለእግዚኣብሔር፡ ወበስብከቱ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ኅሩይ፡ ሊቀ፡ ሐዋርያት፡…
desccontent.itranslation: Fol. 1ra (Introduction): In the Name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit. This (is) the book of the rule of the Apostles and others among the seventy and two lesser Disciples, and of all from their story that was in every country, and of the record of those of them who suffered the martyrdom, and of those of them who died. May their prayer and their blessing take care of us, forever and ever. Amen. ....  [fol. 1va, l.17] With thanks of the Lord and with the help of our Lord Jesus Christ, let us begin [to write] the preaching of the blessed saint Peter, the chosen chief of the Apostles…
desccontent.explicit: Fol. 150vb, l.21 (The Martyrdom of St. Thomas): ...ወናሁ፡ ፈቀደ፡ ከመ፡ ሰማዕክሙ፡ እምኔየ፡ ተዓቀቡ፡ ወኢታርእዩ፡ ፍኖቶ፡ ለሰይጣን፡ ውስተ፡  አልባቢክሙ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይቅረብ፡ ኀቤክሙ፡ ወኩኑ፡ ንቁሃነ፡ ትጽንሑ፡ ዳግመ፡ ምጽአቶ፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ከመ፡ ይትመጦክሙ፡ ውስተ፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ዘበሰማ[ያት᎓]…
desccontent.etranslation: Fol. 150vb, l.21 (The Martyrdom of St. Thomas): … And behold, He wished, as you heard from me, that you should take heed and should not reveal a way for Satan into your hearts, in order that he is not be presented in you, and be you watchful so that you may wait the second Coming of our Lord, so that He may receive you into His Kingdom which (is) in the Heaven.
desccontent.details:
For each text, the equivalent pages of Budge's Edition (BConAp I, II) and the abbreviations used by Bausi in Annali 2000-2001 are given here following:

I-1) BConAp I, 3-6; BConAp II, 2-3; Int in BauGaH

I-2) BConAp I, 7-36; BConAp II, 5-25; Pt1 in BauGaH

I-3) BConAp I, 37-41, 45-49; BConAp II, 26-34; Pt2 in BauGaH

I-4) BConAp I, 41-45; BConAp II, 35-39; Pa1 in BauGaH

I-5) BConAp I, 67-70; BConAp II, 58-61; Si1 in BauGaH

I-6) BConAp I, 70-72; BConAp II, 62-64; Si2 in BauGaH

I-7) BConAp I, 73-76; BConAp II, 65-68; Jc1 in BauGaH

I-8) BConAp I, 76-82; BConAp II, 69-75; Jc2 in BauGaH

I-9) BConAp I, 83-92; BConAp II, 76-86; Ba1 in BauGaH

I-10) BConAp I, 93-100; BConAp II, 87-92; Ba2 in BauGaH

I-11) BConAp I, 101-13; BConAp II, 93-108; Mt1 in BauGaH

I-12) BConAp I, 114-18; BConAp II, 109-14; Mt2 in BauGaH

I-13) BConAp I, 119-25; BConAp II, 115-21; Luc in BauGaH

I-14) BConAp I, 126-34; BConAp II, 122-30; Ph1 in BauGaH

I-15) BConAp I, 135-39; BConAp II, 131-36; Ph2 in BauGaH

I-16) BConAp I, 140-56; BConAp II, 137-53; An1 in BauGaH

I-17) BConAp I, 156-83; BConAp II, 154-85; AnB in BauGaH

I-18) BConAp I, 184-88; BConAp II, 181-85; An2 in BauGaH

I-19) BConAp I, 189-213; BConAp II, 186-211; Jo1 in BauGaH

I-20) BConAp I, 214-22; BConAp II, 212-20; Jo2 in BauGaH

I-21) BConAp I, 223-24; BConAp II, 221-22; JcA in BauGaH

I-22) BConAp I, 225-42; BConAp II, 223-40; Ma1 in BauGaH

I-23) BConAp I, 243-246; BConAp II, 241-45; Ma2 in BauGaH

I-24) BConAp I, 247-53; BConAp II, 246-52; JZ1 in BauGaH

I-25) BConAp I, 254-57; BConAp II, 253-56; JZ2 in BauGaH

I-26) BConAp I, 257-64; BConAp II, 257-64; Mar in BauGaH

I-27) BConAp I, 265-87; BConAp II, 265-86; Th1 in BauGaH

I-28) BConAp I, 287-95; BConAp II, 287-95; Th2 in BauGaH


- Text I-28: text missing after fol. 150vb = BConAP I, 288 l.21-295.

- According to the distribution of the texts, the Gädlä ḥawaryat of MY-001 would belong to I recension (cp. BauGaH, 83-84). Text I-3, the Martyrdom of St. Peter, does not contain the "Discourse of Peter on the Cross" (= BConAp I, 45-49; BConAp II, 30-34).

extras.extra: - Cues for the rubricator (numerals) written in the margins of the column: e.g., fols. 10v, 18v, 37v, 44v, 132v, 133v, 135v. - Short supplication for Zäbanä Krǝstos (in his own hand): fol. 42rb, interlineally. - Crude recent notes in pen or in pencil on fols: 124v (below the text), 125v (above the text), 127r (below the text), 127v (on the left side of the text), 128r (below the text), 129v (below the text), 131v (below the text), 142v (above the text).

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Quire marks are written twice, in the main hand, in the upper margin, decorated with coronis and short chain of dashes and dots: ፲፩: fol. 105v ፲፪: fol. 106r ፲፫: fol. 111r ፲፪ : fol. 115v. In the current condition of the Ms., quire XIII (5/fols. 11r-115v) has two different Ethiopian numerals: ፲፫ “13”, on the first leaf, and ፲፪ “12”, on the last leaf.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the commemoration dates of the Apostles, written in the main hand, in red, in the upper margin (some cases እም stands instead of አመ): አመ:[፭] ሐምሌ: ጴጥሮስ: ወጳውሎስ።: fol. 1r [n.l.]ቱ: ለወርኀ: ኀምሌ: ስምዖን።: fol. 17r አመ: ፲ወ፰᎓ ለወርኀ: ሐምሌ: ያዕቆብ: fol. 19v እም፩፡ ለመስከረም፡ በርተሎሜዎስ።: fol. 36r እም፲ወ፪᎓ ለጥቅምት: ማቴዎስ።: fol. 44v እም፳ወ፪᎓ ለወርኀ፡ ጥቅምት፡ ሉቃስ፡: fol. 53r እም᎓ ፲ወ፷᎓ ለወርኀ፡ ኅዳር᎓ ፊልጶስ።: fol. 56v እም፬፡ ለታኅሣሥ: እንድርያስ: fol. 63v እም፬፡ ለወርኀ፡ ጥር፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ: ዘብዴዎስ።: fol. 92r እም᎓ ፲፡ ለየካቲት፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ወልደ፡ እልፍዮስ።: fol. 109v እም᎓ ፳፡ ለመጋቢት፡ ማቲያስ።: fol. 110v አመ: [በ፩ነሐሴ፡ ከዋኒት] ዘገብረ፡ እንድርያስ።: fol. 112v እም᎓ ፲፯᎓ ለሚያዝያ፡ ያዕቆብ: ወልደ፡ ዘብዴዎስ።: fol. 126r እም᎓ [n.l.]፡ ለሚያዝያ፡ ማርቆስ፡: fol. 132r እም፳ወ፮᎓ ለወርኀ፡ ግንቦት፡ ቶማስ።: fol. 135v.
